attributes.action: Sailor moon to be on Kix TV or pop girl
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to beable to bring the Jappanese TV show sailor moon back on British TV on either Kix TV or Pop girl english version so i can watch it on free view! This is important to me because it was my childhood favourite programe and was the only thing in my childhood that kept me happy!!

I would appreciatie it very much thankyou!
